file.name: allOf-required-parent.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Example
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: http://api.example.xyz/v1
paths:
  /person/display/{personId}:
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: personId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the person to retrieve
          schema:
            type: string
      operationId: list
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/person"
components:
  schemas:
    person:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/personForCreation'
        - properties:
            id:
              type: integer
              format: int32
      required:
        - id

    personForCreation:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/personForUpdate'
      required:
        - firstName
        - name
        - email

    personForUpdate:
      properties:
        firstName:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
        name:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
        birthDate:
          type: string
          format: date
        address:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
        postalCode:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
        city:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
        phoneNumber:
          type: string
          pattern: ^((\+)33|0)[1-9](\d{2}){4}$
        email:
          type: string
          format: email
        nationality:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/person/display/{personId}": get: responses: 200: contents: application/json: generate schema: allOf: schema type mismatch:  and object
